Title: Ihgaluk Crag
Description:
Archmage Modera has taken over at Ihgaluk Crag, to the southeast, continuing her efforts to turn the Saurok against the Zandalari and mogu.

Go to her, and help in any way that you can.
ObjectivesText: Find Archmage Modera outside of Ihgaluk Crag.
RewardText: You have good timing. I am quite in need of your assistance.
